books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The arrival of a mysterious young woman in a small North Carolina town raises questions about her past.
books.name: SAFE HAVEN

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: A superstar agent at the German headquarters of a powerful investigation firm disappears, and the resulting search reveals many secrets.
books.name: PRIVATE BERLIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: The man who has been relentlessly pursuing Sky Davis is not who he pretends to be.
books.name: HOPELESS

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: A Los Angeles policeman and a German shepherd that has worked in Iraq and Afghanistan, both suffering from PTSD, search for the killers of the cop’s partner.
books.name: SUSPECT

books.author: by Kim Harrison
books.description: The witch Rachel Morgan and an unlikely ally battle a demon in order to prevent an apocalypse
books.name: EVER AFTER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The military investigator John Puller probes his aunt’s mysterious death in Florida.
books.name: THE FORGOTTEN

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange this information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Addison Moore
books.description: A one-night stand turns into love for two college students.
books.name: SOMEONE TO LOVE

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: A boy and girl, both with tragedy in their past, come together after a chance encounter.
books.name: THE COINCIDENCE OF CALLIE AND KAYDEN

books.author: by Brad Meltzer
books.description: Tracking an assassin who is recreating the crimes of the four men who murdered presidents, Beecher White discovers that they all were working together.
books.name: THE FIFTH ASSASSIN

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU
